title: Donald Osborne (Classic car historian, curator, TV host )
description:
When it comes to car knowledge, "expert" is an understatement. Donald W. Osborne is a classic car historian, author, consultant and writer. He has appeared on television in his regular segments “Assess & Caress with Donald Osborne” and “Behind the Bowtie” on the internationally-distributed CNBC primetime show “Jay Leno’s Garage. He's also a founding member and CEO of the Audrain Automotive Museum and the Audrain Newport Concours and Motor Week.

@osbornedonald

@audrainconcours

https://www.audrainautomuseum.org/

https://www.audrainconcours.com/

Check out the Audrain YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/AudrainMuseumNetwork/videos

https://www.audrainconcours.com

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals, including free shipping.

 

Check out AutoTempest.com/tst so they know we sent you. 

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dashcam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

This show was recorded on 9/17/2021. Patreon members got to watch the live stream, and our Pro Driver tier patrons have been able to watch or listen to this episode since the day we recorded it. Want to watch a live-stream, listen ad-free, or get early access? Join our Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast

 

Follow us:

@thesmokingtire

@fakezackklapman
 

Watch our car reviews at https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
